alert.note: Alert for Benson; Eddy; Ransom; Richland; Sargent; Towner (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 13 at 5:45PM CST until January 14 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST MONDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 60 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of northeast and southeast North Dakota. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until midnight CST tonight. For the Wind Chill Warning, until noon CST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 5 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Avoid outside activities if possible. If outside, make sure you wear appropriate winter clothing. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at travel.dot.nd.gov and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.
